select_package: Choose the best package for your business
already_subscribed: You are already subscribed to this package.
upgrade_confirmation: Are you sure you want to upgrade to {{packageName}} package?
upgrade_success: Package upgrade process has been initiated. It will be active after the payment process.
upgrade_note: Package upgrades are activated instantly. Please contact our support team for cancellation and refund conditions.
required_permission: You need {{module}}:{{permission}} permission to use this feature. Would you like to upgrade your package?
form_limit_reached: You can create a maximum of {{maxForms}} custom form templates. Go to the Packages screen to upgrade your package.
module_not_allowed: You cannot create custom form templates for the {{module}} module with this package. Go to the Packages screen to upgrade your package.
my_package_desc: Summary and features of your current package
